Hi, I'm Shajira.
Computer Science | Graduation December, 2024

I’m currently a student at the University of North Texas. My major is computer science and my graduation date is December, 2024. I love learning and challenging myself and finding ways to build upon new and old skills. I really enjoy building something out of nothing and exploring creativity when thinking up fun app ideas or coding a simple program. I hope to be able to develop my skills professionally and contribute to a team and learn from others!

Work With Me See My Past Work
); }
